posts.subject: civil war part 2 'rona boogaloo
posts.body:
the federal gov't is going to tell Texas or Mississippi  states to re-instate masks and it'll be on. 
While it happens they won't let background checks on 4473's through after they pass a law or something and crackdown on the whole state.

posts.subject: thank you for making this board.
posts.body: thank you for the work you put in.

posts.subject: peer to peer video software discussion thread.
posts.body:
I try to use LBRY instead of youtube but it still has a content reporting system with DMCA that cannot be disabled. It works well in that it uses a browser for thumbnails descriptions and titles. IT also lets you follow tags and stuff. 

What are some other alternatives that you have seen, with a somewhat usable interface?

posts.subject: Decentralized internet alternatives
posts.body:
here is a zite that has a small overview of some other alternatives.
